name: Split Out
semantic_context: Turn a list inside item(s) into separate items
natural_language_description: 这是 Split Out 节点。主要用于: Turn a list inside item(s) into separate items

fieldToSplitOut.name: fieldToSplitOut
fieldToSplitOut.description: The name of the input fields to break out into separate items. Separate multiple field names by commas. For binary data, use $binary.
fieldToSplitOut.natural_language_description: 参数名: Fields To Split Out | 作用: The name of the input fields to break out into separate items. Separate multiple field names by commas. For binary data, use $binary. | 提示: Use $binary to split out the input item by binary data | (必填项)

include.name: include
include.description: Whether to copy any other fields into the new items
include.natural_language_description: 参数名: Include | 作用: Whether to copy any other fields into the new items | 默认值: noOtherFields

fieldsToInclude.name: fieldsToInclude
fieldsToInclude.description: Fields in the input items to aggregate together
fieldsToInclude.natural_language_description: 参数名: Fields To Include | 作用: Fields in the input items to aggregate together

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: disableDotNotation (值: None) - Whether to disallow referencing child fields using `parent.child` in the field name
destinationFieldName (值: None) - The field in the output under which to put the split field contents
includeBinary (值: None) - Whether to include the binary data in the new items
